text: The coppery titi (Plecturocebus cupreus) is a species of titi, a type of New World monkey, from South America. It is found in the Amazon of Brazil and Peru, and perhaps northern Bolivia. It was described as Callicebus cupreus in 1823. ==References== ==External links== * Primate Info Net Factsheet coppery titi Category:Mammals of Brazil Category:Mammals of Peru coppery titi
title: Coppery titi
